notes.text:
Alright boys, here’s the most consistent variant without a doubt
Warning: do NOT play this deck if you get easily tilted
Stringing together 5 wins was a challenge every single time, I would usually brick on my rankups
I love this deck because of its resource management. If you open optimally then you will always have a fusion play and will always be able to maintain at least 3 cards in hand
If you don’t open poly then the majority of the time you can just play Volcanics, which is why this deck had so much success.
Beatdown was 100% necessary in this meta; if it wasn’t then I would easily play either restart or duel standby and I guarantee this would open well almost 100% of the time. With those 2 skills you could probably run defensive cards as well
Brick hands are: opening all gem-knights or opening both BA and poly
Or somehow opening 1 garnet 1 tourmaline and 1 painful
